Reviews.Title: no problem
Reviews.Author: tmc
Reviews.Content: I never bought a phone online before so I was a little nervous however I figured I would take a chance and I am so glad I did. I had no problems. I picked this phone out, I paid, it was sent to me within the time frame stated (less than a week) I called Verizon, they turned it on. I am now ready to purchase another one and I purposely looked for this seller since I had no issues the first time.

Reviews.Title: Great little phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "chiclets5"
Reviews.Content: This phone is easy to use and offers full flip up keyboard for fast texting. I also like that you can open the phone for larger screen and it sits firmly for hands free talking using the speaker option. I had one several years ago until I updated to a smart phone model. I purchased this one for my mom, since I really enjoyed using this model before. Some nice features, and easy to use / understand. I purchased a refurbished one this time,and the first one arrived in 3 days in wonderful condition. I had a problem with the item working correctly and the vendor answered within a few hours (it was even a Sunday!) Wonderful response, they sent a replacement out the next day, and it arrived very quickly. The replacement phone has some wear on the corners (not important to me), and seems to be working just fine after several days. I'm very impressed by the fast response and resolution from this vendor and would definitely use them again.

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Laura S.
Reviews.Content: I was nervous about buying a cell phone, something I rely on and use everyday, on the Internet, but AppleWireless exceeded my standards with customer service and an amazing product. The phone works perfectly and the set-up with my cell phone provider was effortless. I'm happy happy happy!

Reviews.Title: awesome quality
Reviews.Author: Percy L. Schlimm
Reviews.Content: This has been an extremely good phone, didn't even break the times I've dropped it.  the quality is excellent as well.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: phazeout
Reviews.Content: I had a phone like this for years & it fell out of my pocket and was run over by several cars.I ordered this one not knowing what to expect.It is great! It works just like my old one and I am very pleased.I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase!
Reviews.Author: Vicki Ryan
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace my broken Samsung Intensity.  I only need a phone for talking and texting, and this phone is perfect for that.  Very easy to text with.  After I received it, I went online and tried to activate it and was told I had to buy a data package.  You DO NOT have to purchase a data package.  Just call Verizon directly and they will activate it with no problem.  Also, I purchased this phone from Applewireless.  I highly recommend this seller.  Very quick delivery and the product was just as described.....New in box, and everything was included.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: ashley
Reviews.Content: i choose this rating bc this phone is the bomb! i was a little scared at first to buy a phone offline! but i was impressed i would deff recommend to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Phone's condition
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: It was in good condition with a few scratches like the description posted. But it does turn off randomly from time to time whether you are using it or it is sitting there not being touched.

Reviews.Title: Review of LG enV3
Reviews.Author: D. Viglio
Reviews.Content: For a used phone, it was in good condition, few scratches, all ports covered. QWERTY  keys all wk, user friendly. It has a long battery life, have gone 3 days without charging, that is with little use each day.  Would recomend to anyone

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amy "Gr8tsoul"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my mom because we didn't want a data plan, but she still wanted to be able to text.  This is a great upgrade for her-she's 78 and loves it :)

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't do again.
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: This was a hassle. I purchased the phone and the one I was sent was a piece of crap. Then I was offered to have a replacement. It is an ok phone. It definitely isn't what I was hoping for as a replacement of my old phone. Both phones had been damaged by water. The first phone I received was a waste of my time. The phone I was wanting to replace with it was in better shape. The second one works, but the battery is crappy and it doesn't always fully charge when I plug it in. The only good thing about this transaction was the shipping. It was fast and arrived before it said that it was going to.  I would never buy from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Works well and is simple to use
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: My wife dropper her old phone in water and killed it. The contract was not up and I wanted a basic phone that I could activate on my existing Verizon account. Called Verizon and phone was activated in minutes. Only drawback so far is that the camera is about useless when the phone is flipped open.

Reviews.Title: Love the phone but hate the accessories
Reviews.Author: Beth Hollick
Reviews.Content: I had an LG enV2 and it was a great phone until I had to keep buying batteries for it so I switched to a different phone because Verizon did not carry this model any more.  My daughter was searching Amazon and for this phone and I was so happy to go back to the enV phone.  When I got the phone, it came without a battery.  Once the battery was sent, it would not charge, so they sent me another battery which also would not charge.  After trouble shooting everything, I found out the charger they sent was not for this phone so they sent out a new charger which again would not charge the phone.  I gave up and finally found an old charger I had that worked.  Will not order a phone from this company again.

Reviews.Title: Not so good.
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: The phone was nice itself. But stopped working after a week having it. It would turn on but never load up right. I didn't return it because it would been just a hassle.

Reviews.Title: LG ENV3
Reviews.Author: SAVAGE
Reviews.Content: I purchased the LG ENV3 as a gift for my wife who is very content with her simple flip phone. It arrived in perfect time & in perfect working condition, thank you. A+++++++++

Reviews.Title: Worked..... then Started crapping out on me
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: I got the phone as promised and worked flawlessly for a good three months; then I dopped it and the external display screen went white and calls started dropping.  Wished I read that the phone was refurbished or seller refurbished.  I guess i have to wait for my upgrade then.......

Reviews.Title: Phone is dud
Reviews.Author: lynn c morehouse jr
Reviews.Content: The phone is terrible. Only way to USA it is to turn the speaker on to respond after a call. Had contacts transferes from my old phone so I couldn't send it back right away. Now have to wait on another phone to transfer info from this piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Carol Kroeger
Reviews.Content: I liked the key board most, just liked it all. My daughter even ordered one & gave up her I phone.

Reviews.Title: Poor packaging, Unclear description regarding packaging. No directions included.
Reviews.Author: Penny A. Parrishcross
Reviews.Content: The phone is okay. It was for my teen daugher. Just for calling & texting. However, the seller neglected to say the phone is no longer manufactured, packaged it in a box for another phone, and sent it without directions. Because it was to be a gift it would have been nice to have had this info included in the description prior to my purchasing it. Had I known I simply would have passed over it. When I contacted them about it they were cold about it. Obviously their customers mean little to them. They did offer to give me a refund, but, it was too late. Christmas was here. I wouldn't have had a replacement in time to have it under the tree. Honesty up front would have prevented the whole thing. Oh and they provided a PDF online for the directions. As if I should have to look that up. No.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for a teen and easy setup!
Reviews.Author: Libby Combs
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my 14 year old so. We didn't need all of the bells and whistles of a smart phone and the pricy data package that comes alone with them. It's hard to find a inexpensive phone out there that is going to meet my needs as to what I need for it to do for him as a mother and what he wants as a teenage boy. This phone was the perfect compromise. He likes, I like. Win win!On another note, I was sceptical about buying from a third party suplier. I wasn't sure how difficult it was going to be getting the phone set up with my phone carrier once I got it. But since buying a uses phone thru verizon was much more expensive and they didn't have a great selection of non-smartphone options to chose from I took a chance. I must say getting the phone activated took one phone call and a few prompts on an automated system. As long as you know your password it is a breeze!! Would do this again in a heartbeat!

Reviews.Title: Replacement phone
Reviews.Author: K. Hair "SML"
Reviews.Content: We bought this phone as a replacement phone for our mother because she already knows how to use it. Doesn't need a data plan just calling features.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Kristine Poole
Reviews.Content: I love the attached keyboard - makes texting very easy and effortless.  Camera not so great, but I don't use it that often.

Reviews.Title: just right
Reviews.Author: mspaganwolf "mspaganwolf"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use.  Just seems to be the right size for my hand.  The screen is plenty.  Love the push up to type feature.  Doesn't feel or look like I am holding a book to my face.  Small enough to have a sure grip and even though I love it, it isn't THE phone that they like to steal from your hand.

Reviews.Title: its a  good phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Does not ring as loud as my other Verizon phone did...tried all the different rings...when you answer it by opening the phone its on speaker which is. Oil sometime

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Caitlin Morley
Reviews.Content: My phone was in poor condition in short time.... key pad was messed up after good care for barely 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Diane J. Allen
Reviews.Content: This phone is working out great so far. There are a few options that are not included on this phone that I had on my previous phone. The battery does not seem to stay charged as well as it should for a brand new battery. Other than that, its OK

Reviews.Title: love the basic phone
Reviews.Author: dru
Reviews.Content: like no data  just texting nice just hope the battery holds up longer  this time love the keyboard and the basic options

Reviews.Title: Reliable
Reviews.Author: Lori G.
Reviews.Content: I went from the LG en V3 to the Revolution.  Worst decision ever.  I'm back to the en V3 for good!  The most reliable phone with 2-3 day battery life on a full charge.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Jan Flue
Reviews.Content: This phone is working great. The phone came as to us as advertised. The transaction was smooth and we had no problems.

Reviews.Title: bad luck phone
Reviews.Author: Rob Y.
Reviews.Content: Had it for around six mo. Then it would take 5 to 6 sec to change to next screen an no ,mater what I did or what I wastold to do nothing happened and you get tired of working to right it.Now with this other quation in he air IL,let all knowwhat happens.This phone did not come this dealer that I am working with ,The dealer  I am working with now did a good job for me and I am told buy another that he is honest and fair.....RY

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: yosifa s.
Reviews.Content: verizon does not back up the info anymore cause tech outdated and did not know this -but i like the phone very much -and am not interested in getting a smart phone

Reviews.Title: looks older
Reviews.Author: janis myers
Reviews.Content: My current LG looks newer than this. However, as long as it works, it will be fine. It's in pretty good condition

Reviews.Title: Worthless Phone!
Reviews.Author: Michael Coll
Reviews.Content: Poor prduct, buttons too small and akward to use this phone. Do not waste your money on this LG phone!! Battery charger is cheap and shorted out.  I used this for one month and sent it to the recycle bin!

Reviews.Title: Some issues.
Reviews.Author: AuntieEm91
Reviews.Content: Got this phone as a replacement for my sister, she said that there were some issues with it, and for the amount we paid we didn't see any reason in returning it. When it came down to it she ended up using a different phone she had at home. Can't win them all.

Reviews.Title: new is not new
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: i ordered a new phone and the one i got is rebuilt. how do i return it? i want an actual new phone

Reviews.Title: It's Nice, But Has Problems
Reviews.Author: P. Montgomery "aspen_house"
Reviews.Content: The phone shuts down on its own at random times. Battery lasts quite a while and there's a lot of little things you can do to personalize your phone, but the main problem is it shuts down whenever you start up the camera or even when it's just sitting there. It's okay, not the best

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfactory customer service
Reviews.Author: Maddog 23
Reviews.Content: It has been over a week since I was promised to receive my merchandise, and yet I still have not received. I'm also unable to receive any information relative to tracking the product and determining a location. I am highly disappointed and feel this is bad customer service and unprofessional.

ProductInfo.Features:
Compact QWERTY Keyboard ,Bluetooth Stereo Capable
3 Megapixel Camera & Camcorder
Music Player, microSDTM Memory Port , Large External Keys for Easy Dialing
Includes: handset, rechargeable battery, wall charger.
Clear ESN , Ready To Activate, No contract Required
ProductInfo.Name: LG enV3 VX9200 Verizon Cell Phone - No Contract - (Maroon) Red - QWERTY
